name: Pixel Noir (PC, Mac, iOS, Android, PS4, Vita)
blurb: Help fund a JRPG-inspired, 16-bit noir detective Role Playing Game!

rewards.reward: No Reward

[EARLY BIRD SPECIAL TIER] 

•	One copy of Pixel Noir for either PC, Mac, or PS4!
•	One copy of Pixel Noir for either iOS, Android, or Vita!
•	Any/All DLC or extras that are made available to purchase post launch!  
•	Special in game equipment for The Detective!

[REGULAR GUY TIER]

•	One copy of Pixel Noir for either PC, Mac, or PS4!
•	One copy of Pixel Noir for either iOS, Android, or Vita!
•	Any/All DLC or extras that are made available to purchase post launch!  
•	Special in game equipment for The Detective!

[DIGITAL DELUXE TIER] 

•	Everything in the previous tier!
•	A digital soundtrack!
•	A digital art book!
•	A digital strategy guide!
•	A digital version of the Pixel Noir comic book, The Mrs. And the Mark!
omic book, The Mrs. And the Mark!

[DIGITAL DELUXE INTERNATIONAL TIER] \r\n\u2022 Everything in the previous tier! \u2022 A digital soundtrack! \u2022 A digital art book! \u2022 A digital strategy guide! \u2022 A digital version of the Pixel Noir comic book, The Mrs. and the Mark!

[GUMSHOE EDITION INTERNATIONAL TIER]\r\n\u2022 Everything in the previous tier! \u2022 A Pixel Noir t-shirt! (Designs will be voted on by the Backers!) \u2022 3 Ultra Rare cards for the card game! (only to ever be available on the Kickstarter!) \u2022 A Set of in game equipment for each unlockable party member! \u2022 Access to the Pixel Noir beta, presented as a prequel episode with an exclusive story!

[GUMSHOE EDITION TIER]•	Everything in the previous tier!
•	A Pixel Noir t-shirt! (Designs will be voted on by the Backers!) 
•	3 Ultra Rare cards for the card game! (only to ever be available on the Kickstarter!)
•	A Set of in game equipment for each unlockable party member!
•	Access to the Pixel Noir beta, presented as a prequel episode with an exclusive story!

[COLLECTOR'S EDITION TIER] •	Everything in the previous tier!
•	A complete physical set of the card game!
•	Special armor set AND weapon for each unlockable party member!
•	A physical art/guide/comic book!
•	A physical soundtrack!
•	A physical retro style box so Pixel Noir can sit alongside with the rest of your 16-bit RPG collection!

[COLLECTOR'S EDITION INTERNATIONAL TIER] \u2022 Everything in the previous tier! \u2022\tA complete physical set of the card game! \u2022 Special armor set AND weapon for each unlockable party member! \u2022 A physical art/guide/comic book! \u2022 A physical soundtrack! \u2022 A physical retro style box so Pixel Noir can sit alongside with the rest of your 16-bit RPG collection!
[NPC TIER]\r\n\u2022\tEverything in the 100.00 Collector's Edition! \r\n\u2022\tGet to work with our team to design a NPC sprite for the game!

[ARMOR TIER]\r\n\u2022\tEverything in the 100.00 Collector's Edition! \r\n\u2022\tWork with our team to design an Armor set for the game!  Create the look, attribures, and perks that your armor set will provide! Even discuss with us where we should hide it in Pinnacle City and what other players must do to find it!
[WEAPON TIER]\r\n\u2022\tEverything in the 100.00 Collector's Edition! \r\n\u2022\tGet to work with our team to design a weapon for the game!
[BOSS TIER]\r\n\u2022\tEverything in the 100.00 Collector's Edition! \r\n\u2022\tGet to work with our team to design a BOSS for the game! :O!

[CRD TECH TIER]\r\n\u2022\tEverything in the 100.00 Collector\u2019s Edition! \r\n\u2022\tGet a card created for you to be part of the Kickstarter Expansion of the card game! You'll get the original sketch, final card, and digital version upon its release! Each card can act as a summon in game using the [Call for Backup] special ability!

[DETECTIVE EDITION TIER]
•	Limited to 100, this numbered hard cased version of the Collector’s Edition will include every non limited physical item listed in the previous tiers.
•	Included with the box is a physical case file that has haunted The Detective over the course of his entire career.  Only the clues provided in the case file are capable of solving this terrifying mystery and earn the rewards that come with the feat.
•	The hard box’s size and materials will be voted on before completion of the Kickstarter!

[BE THE CLIENT TIER]
•	We'll make a sprite of you and have you help us create an entire case where you are the client!  
•	The case will be included with the release of the game!
•	Includes everything in the 99$ Collectors Edition!

[CRD TECH INTERNATIONAL TIER] \u2022 Everything in the 100.00 Collector\u2019s Edition! \u2022 Get a card created for you to be part of the Kickstarter Expansion of the card game! You'll get the original sketch, final card, and digital version upon its release! Each card can act as a summon in game using the [Call for Backup] special ability!

[DETECTIVE EDITION INTERNATIONAL TIER] \u2022 Limited to 100, this numbered hard cased version of the Collector\u2019s Edition will include every non limited physical item listed in the previous tiers. \u2022 Included with the box is a physical case file that has haunted The Detective over the course of his entire career. Only the clues provided in the case file are capable of solving this terrifying mystery and earn the rewards that come with the feat. \u2022 The hard box\u2019s size and materials will be voted on before completion of the Kickstarter!

[AREA TIER] \u2022 Everything in the 100.00 Collector's Edition! \u2022 Get to work with our team to design an area of your choice!  This would include a building, inside and out (within reason of course, we can't make a skyscraper in there), with up to three custom NPC's you design!  We could even set it up as a shop! :O!
[YOUR NAME HERE TIER]\r\n\u2022\tReceive everything below! Have YOUR NAME show up as the Default name for the Detective!

[PAPER CROWN TIER]

Oh wow.  We will probably fold a really amazing paper crown* for you when we see you, gently resting it upon your head with a grace in our movements that only your presence can inspire.

Seriously though, pledge this much and we will welcome you to come see the inner workings of Pixel Noir, chat future ideas, and be sure to invite you to any official event we throw for Pixel Noir as a highly esteemed guest of honor.

*The paper crown may be made of napkins hastily and potentially poorly upon the excitement of having you in our lives all of a sudden.
